DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase 2, randomized, multicenter, parallel group, double-blind, dose-ranging, placebo-controlled evaluation of the analgesic efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics of ketamine sublingual wafer in adult subjects who experience post operative pain after undergoing third molar extraction.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Analgesic Properties of a Sublingual Wafer Formulation of Ketamine Following Third Molar Extraction
DOC.criteria: 18 38 years of age Scheduled to undergo two ipsilateral third molar extractions
